page.title: 19RECREATION
page.content: The Squashtec was founded in March 1981 when it took over from the Houghton Racket Club which had been formed in 1969. The main sporting facilites are{squash courts, snooker and a{trimnasium.}There are 2 full size snooker tables in separate rooms, for hire in half_hourly sessions. The trimnasium is a single room housing equipment such as an exercise bike, weights, and a{multi_gym,}which can be used by adult members at any time. The main facilty is the squash courts two of which are of very high standard with spectator facilities to accomodate major competitions.{Junior {coaching}on Saturdays encourages youngsters in the area and the clubs popularity is evident since it has 800 members. The memorable events that have been held here are the Audi Worldcup and Debenhams World Plate.
